Key Match Events: Niclas Fullkrug scored the first goal for Germany in the 27th minute.
Jamal Musiala scored the second goal for Germany in the 58th minute.
Florian Wirtz scored the third goal for Germany in the 66th minute.
Aleksandar Pavlovic scored the fourth goal for Germany in the 77th minute.
Kai Havertz scored a penalty in the 81st minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Niclas Fullkrug scored his first Germany goal since joining West Ham in the summer.
Germany started their Nations League campaign with a victory over Hungary in Dusseldorf.
Kai Havertz hit the underside of the crossbar in each half.
